title: SoftBank Is in Talks to Invest $30 Billion More in OpenAI
description: SoftBank Group Corp. is in discussions to invest as much as $30 billion more in OpenAI, a sharp increase in commitment that reflects founder Masayoshi Son’s ambitions to play a central role in developing artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Over 100 Indian AI startup founders moving to US for funds and talent
description: More than 100 Indian AI founders have moved or are preparing to move to the US, drawn by closer access to customers, capital and the most advanced artificial intelligence ecosystems, despite talk of a reverse brain drain. Composio, Meetstream.ai, Smallest.ai, Beatoven.ai and GetCrux are among startups that have moved base to the US over the past couple of years, while several others are in the process of relocating, investors and founders told ET.
content:

title: Pilot to platform: how enterprises turn AI experiments into results
description: Australia’s long experimentation phase with artificial intelligence is giving way to a more sober and consequential challenge.
content: For many organisations, the early attraction of AI lay in its novelty. Teams were encouraged to run pilots, test generative models on isolated datasets or explore new interfaces for internal search. These experiments helped build familiarity, but the... [5959 chars]

title: Anthropic Closes Funding Round Exceeding Its $10 Billion Target
description: Artificial intelligence company Anthropic closes its latest funding round at a $350 billion valuation.
content:
Artificial intelligence company Anthropic has closed its latest funding round at a $350 billion valuation, exceeding its $10 billion target.

title: UK Pledges AI Training for All to Grasp $193 Billion Opportunity
description: Technology Secretary Liz Kendall promised to offer training in artificial intelligence for all UK workers as the government seeks to embrace a technology that it said has the potential to boost economic output by £140 billion ($193 billion) a year.

title: Vention Raises $110M Funding to Accelerate AI
description: Vention, a developer of artificial intelligence-powered software and hardware for automation and robotics, announced Tuesday that it has secured $110 million in fresh financing, a cash infusion aimed at scaling what the company calls a new era of manufacturing automation. The company, advised by Norton Rose Fulbright, said the funding will fuel wider deployment of Vention Raises $110M Funding to scale AI-driven automation and expand globally across factories.

title: Seagate forecasts quarterly results above estimates on strong data storage demand
description: Seagate Technology forecast third-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, benefiting from strong demand for its data storage devices as enterprises scale up their use of artificial intelligence.
content: Tech firms are investing hundreds of billions of dollars into data centers and related infrastructure to train and run large language models. This surge in demand is benefiting hardware suppliers such as Seagate, whose hard disk drives are used to st... [1304 chars]

title: An AI model can predict and help contain disease outbreaks in confined spaces
description: Researchers have developed a new artificial intelligence-based modeling tool that can accurately predict how infectious diseases spread in confined environments and help identify more effective containment strategies, according to new research. The study introduces the AI-GIS Infection Dynamics (AGID) model.
